name: Alex Tarana
subtitle: All my apps in one place.

apps.name: PeopleDrop
apps.subtitle: A super power dating app.
apps.localizedDescription:
PeopleDrop is a dating app that allows you to discover and connect, chat and meet with people around you in a convenient and fast way.
Everything is at your findertips!
Also discover our "redlight" mode, the most direct way to get to the meeting with ephemeral chat and end-to-end encryption.

versions.localizedDescription:
We have fixed some bugs, in particular we have changed the algorithm to display better results on the map!

privacy.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: This app needs access to location when in the background to be always visible to other people.
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app needs access to microphone to record audio for the chat purpose.
privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs access to camera to take photos for the chat purpose and to upload your own profile photos.
privacy.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app needs access to location when open to be visible to other people.
privacy.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: This app needs access to location when open to be visible to other people.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to local photo library for the chat purpose and to update your account.
